data.title: Crooked Coast — Stowe Cider

data.text:
We’re stoked to welcome Crooked Coast to the Tuned Up Winter Concert Series at Shakedown Street. Bring your friends and family and come on down to jam out with us on March 15th at 8PM.

About Crooked Coast:

Crooked Coast doesn't waste a minute getting to the goods. This vibrant, high-energyMassachusetts band creates powerful, infectious songs that combine the best of punk, rock, reggae, hip hop, and pop. Their unique sound - which manages to be both nostalgic and fresh - transports you to an epic summer party, winning them a rabid fanbase and spots in some of the best festivals and venues around, including Boston Calling and Beach Road.

Rather than getting hung up on musical genres, Crooked Coast instead focuses on writing powerful lyrics, and melodies with undeniable hooks. The band’s ability to tell a story and connect with their audience speaks to their comfort with and promotion of both individualism and community. This connection, combined with their impressive energy and incredibly popular live shows, have secured them an ever-expanding tight-knit fan base.

The band blurs the line between music and visual art, self-producing music videos anddesigning their own line of merchandise. With Crooked Coast swag, you can take the partywith you wherever you go.

Important Show Info:

Doors: 7pm

Show: 8pm

Shakedown Lounge at Stowe Cider

21 + show

Tickets available at the door.

All tickets are GA. Tables will be available (first come, first serve.)

No pets, please.

No outside food allowed.

Tickets are non-refundable
